channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenHarmony -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenHarmony -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-28951|2024-04-02T06:23:12.669Z -- OpenHarmony -- OpenHarmony
item.description: in OpenHarmony v4.0.0 and prior versions allow a local attacker arbitrary code execution in pre-installed apps through use after free.

item.title: CVE-2024-28226|2024-04-02T06:23:07.999Z -- OpenHarmony -- OpenHarmony
item.description: in OpenHarmony v4.0.0 and prior versions allow a remote attacker cause DOS through improper input.
